content: आनी {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bring, fetch; भुवनं मत्पार्श्वमानीयते <ls>Ś. 7. 8</ls>; तेषामुदकमानीय <ls>Ms. 3. 210.</ls> {@--2@} To bring on, produce, cause; आनिनाय भुवः कंपं <ls>R. 15. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To lead towards or near, convey. {@--4@} To mix in. {@--5@} To reduce or lead to any condition; वशं आनी to reduce to subjection. {@--6@} To lead off, divert. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to bring (with <ab>instr.</ab> of person who brings); <ls>R. 12. 12</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 74.</ls>
